alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens and southwestern Treutlen Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Rockledge to Lowery to near Cedar Grove, and moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lowery, Orland, and Rockledge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
